NEW: Soil pollution is damaging Herefordshire's rivers and hitting fish species. 
Officers from @EnvAgencyMids are inspecting hundreds of recently harvested fields at risk from heavy rain, reminding farmers what steps they can take. Enforcement action could follow.@DaveThroupEA https://t.co/N5H3UQiaBQ

Heavy showers this weekend could lead to surface water and river flooding in some communities. Our teams are ready to respond. Check your flood risk and sign up for free flood warnings: https://t.co/uGQ4g6RGOV https://t.co/LVmohryY03
What does that mean for fishing  from Thursday @EnvAgency

#URGENT!
Based on preliminary data, #Azerbaijan used banned white phosphorus munitions over #Artsakh/#Karabakh causing fires to forests next to civilian communities.
In addition to #ecological disaster they aim at burning the people hidden in the forests. https://t.co/dp4xYy0Mx5

Do you use cotton balls, pads or buds?

Never put them down the loo as they don't break down like toilet paper, causing blockages and harming our environment.

To protect your pipes and the environment, only flush the three Ps - poo, pee and toilet paper.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/utmNK3x3jp

 @LancasterCC @LancashireCC @EnvAgencyNW @LancashireFRS @LancsPolice will all be doing their very best to mitigate the impact of human activities on nature tomorrow.

This is a valuable step in supporting NHS Test and Trace.

tweets.text: @Johnwritlarge Know the area already quite well as relatively local. I‚Äôve just done an assessment myself with new @EnvAgency climate change adjustments (for planners) & it‚Äôs not a happy picture. Thank you EA! Although not sure the planners used your tool in this instance ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

And here is some work by @ForestryEngland, continuing to destroy peatlands and other Annex I habitats at Berrier End in Cumbria on a huge scale. 

All of this work which is destroying vast areas of wet heath and bog will soon be covered in >50% non-native conifer plantation... https://t.co/ecQE3Tp9Zl
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/1z2pDvnaJT

New @ForestryComm & @EnvAgency #Research & #Analysis on 3D-buffer strips 
https://t.co/9E4jYneVeQ
Good resource. Nothing particularly new. 
Q is - how do we ensure this info is in the hands of staff & contractors on the ground and gets put into practice? 
Via @Hydro_Mark @TM_WRT https://t.co/KFqU81rjiW

Not just special circumstances missing from this dev, no onsite parking, facilities or littler bins! Big thank you to @PaulHooton5 for clearing the mess left by @AmazonNewsUK @KelloggsUKI carriers. @StHelensEnviro @EnvAgency @MerPolTraffic @sthelensstar @sthelenscouncil https://t.co/L3IWGab3tF

21 containers of illegally exported waste sent to Sri Lanka have successfully returned to England.

We will investigate who exported this #WasteCrime. 

Those responsible could face 2 years in prison, and an unlimited fine.

Read more here: https://t.co/ti1Wt6XYYP https://t.co/a347mSYEpi

#TeamEA is ready for the next band of rain tomorrow. 

We are out across the North West to ensure our rivers are clear of debris and we are monitoring the levels in our regions rivers carefully. 

We‚Äôll issue flood alerts & warnings where needed. Sign up https://t.co/F1wbUHPZe8 https://t.co/g1t6sPyqz1

tweets.text: This has absolutely got to stop @guardianeco . With supposed friends like @ForestryEngland @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland England's wildlife needs no enemies. https://t.co/TIQNLgYFkv

@articcheesepuff @AquiferChalk As yet the @EnvAgency have not received the application from HS2 for environmental approval for the tunnelling work. When they do odds on there will be no public consultation and it will go through on the nod. Chalk rivers sacrificed on the alter of reckless vandalism.

Along with the @EnvAgencySE we are appealing to people to stop dumping objects in the River Ouse following a clear up by specialist contractors between Cliff Bridge and Willey‚Äôs Bridge in #Lewes earlier this month
https://t.co/DaIpG4Eidu https://t.co/j1K1OtL3uV

tweets.text: @AdamSmithMD @Artak_Beglaryan @World_Wildlife @nature_org @oceana @Greenpeace @BBCEarth @RnfrstAlliance @Defenders @MeatlessMonday @UNEP @EnvAgency @EPA @ETEnvironment @arochaint @biofuelwatch @ClientEarth @friends_earth @EnvDefenseFund @Global_Witness What is that? Appeals for ‚Äúhumanity‚Äù?

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency It pats itself on the back saying ‚Äòaren‚Äôt we doing well, aren‚Äôt we brilliant‚Äô whereas clearly they‚Äôre doing as well as the sh*t they‚Äôre allowing into the rivers üôÑ I feel sorry for the hard working staff on the ground being let down by the (lack of) leadership

@eabroken2020 @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @mrsk3r @Calderdale @Tod_Flood_Group @TodmordenNews1 @YorkshireWater @slowtheflow_UK This temporary deployment was part of a pre written plan and was enacted prior to the forecast heavy rain falling.

How we manage our assets is described in our Asset Management Strategy.

Read counts from environmental DNA (eDNA) metabarcoding reflect fish abundance and biomass in drained ponds https://t.co/waziG2JWwb via @MBMGjournal. Well done @cristinadimuri and the great team involved! @Calvia14 @ianjwinfield @Joe77Li @ProfColinBean @kezwalsh_env @G_S_Sellers
These, and helium balloons, and fireworks! Is anyone listening @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency https://t.co/zJfdI8Y1BA

@AquiferChalk HS2 awaiting the boring machine for a 16km tunnel. 'The Chilterns which not only is an AONB but it‚Äôs a globally unique chalk aquifer. We are already seeing huge and irreversible damage on the surface' https://t.co/C7Hi27OiG3

@PlanetBubble We live in a mapped flood zone and although it does flood, it‚Äôs on the other side. These things have become the bane of anyone living near water. Best to speak to residents & get assurances of historic precedents and where water naturallyflowsü§î

Our teams are out in Yorkshire checking temporary flood defences ahead of heavy rainfall tomorrow (images show Batley and Copley). Keep an eye on your local flood risk and be prepared to take action if you are at risk https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware https://t.co/yP2gPSpvWj
@EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @mrsk3r @Calderdale @Tod_Flood_Group @TodmordenNews1 @YorkshireWater @slowtheflow_UK Why don‚Äôt you know before the rain what to do? A plan?

Heavy rainfall is expected in Yorkshire from Sunday afternoon. We are monitoring the forecast and river levels closely and will issue warnings if necessary. You can sign up for free flood warnings here: https://t.co/dj5PCHr2lX #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware

Our new paper out today in @Ecol_Evol - targeted and passive #eDNA approaches for quagga mussel detection! check it out! #INNS #invasivespecies @EawagResearch @freshwaterbio  
https://t.co/2tFVNkKhgA

On @BBCWomansHour heard @EnvAgency Chair claim that raw sewage discharges only happen with ‚Äòextreme‚Äô rainfall. That‚Äôs what @thameswater claimed 15 years ago, & it was tosh, was once a week. 
EU law requiring sewage treatment is 30 yrs old, appalling water co‚Äôs still not compliant

tweets.text:
2019 - Turkey used white phosphorus illegally in Syria, with reports showing children were among those incinerated or suffering severe burns.

The @UN, @WHO and @OPCW refused to investigate, dismissing these as 'allegations' due to insufficient evidence.  

#PeaceforArmenians https://t.co/qSmqQEMZPS
